definition: (onom.) beating of the heart/pitapat/pulsation of a machine
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: The pump was stuttering out water.
sentences.chinese: 抽水機突突地冒出了水。

sentences.english: Schedule certain times of the day to chug back 8 ounces at once.
sentences.chinese: 附表一定的時間，每天突突回到8盎司一次。

sentences.english: The veins on his forehead seem ready to pop.
sentences.chinese: 他前額上的青筋突突直跳。

sentences.english: My eyes clouded over and the blood pulsated in my temples.
sentences.chinese: 我眼前一片雲霧，熱血在我太陽穴裏突突地跳動。

sentences.english: Her heart jumped when she heard the news .
sentences.chinese: 她聽到那消息心突突直跳。

sentences.english: Later I found a tuk-tuk, rush rush rushed, straight to the mutton shop.
sentences.chinese: 後來找了輛三蹦子，突突突，直奔羊肉湯店。

sentences.english: Later I found a tuk-tuk, rush rush rushed, straight to the mutton shop.
sentences.chinese: 後來找了輛三蹦子，突突突，直奔羊肉湯店。

sentences.english: The boat chugged along the canal.
sentences.chinese: 小船穩穩地順著運河突突地航行。

sentences.english: He knocked twice at the gate, his heart thudding violently.
sentences.chinese: 敲了兩下門，心上還突突直跳。

sentences.english: The boat chugged along the canal.
sentences.chinese: 小船穩穩地順着運河突突地航行。

sentences.english: Then I heard the train stutter out of the staiton.
sentences.chinese: 後來，我聽到火車突突地駛離了車站。

sentences.english: Chug forward and stomp your foot for the pancake with ball change.
sentences.chinese: 突突向前踩球改變了煎餅與你的腳。

sentences.english: I knocked on the door with heart fiercely beating.
sentences.chinese: 敲了兩下門，心上還突突直跳。

sentences.english: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.chinese: 離老遠，我都能聽到農機具的突突聲。

definition: to jump about/(of the heart) to beat wildly
(onom.) slam
to get angry/to burn with rage
thumping sound (onom.)/to be eager and anxious (to do sth)/faithful and upright
(onom.) thud/thumping/thudding/pounding
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
to beat a drum/to play a drum/(fig.) to feel nervous
impulsive
(onom.) bang! (gong, gun firing etc)
to become agitated/to feel nervous
booming/roaring
restless with anxiety/unbearably hot and anxious
(onom.) thump/thud
thoracic cavity/intonation/accent
veins/blue veins
to feel numb
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
